page.title: 08COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: THE LOCAL NEWSPAPER IS THE BRECON AND RADNOR EXPRESS WHICH COMES OUT ON A THURSDAY AND IS AVIDLY READ BY MOST PEOPLE IN THE AREA.IT GIVES ACCOUNT OF LOCAL EVENTS SUCH AS FUNERALS AND WEDDINGS AND AS MANY OF THE IN HABITANTS HAVE LIVED IN THE AREA FOR A LONG TIME THESE ARE NATURALLY OF WIDE INTEREST.ADVERTISEMENTS ARE ALSO POPULAR SELLING GOODS OR SERVICES OR GIVING NOTICE OF LOCAL FETES OR CONCERTS. THE HEREFORD TIMES IS READ BY SOME OF THE RESIDENTS WITH WIDER CONNECTIONS BUT THE HEREFORD ADVERTISING MAGAZINE _ THE AD.MAG _.SEEMS TO BE READ BY ALL.THIS IS SIMPLY A VEHICLE FOR ADVERTISING GOODS OF ALL DESCRIPTIONS FOR SALE AND IS USED EXTENSIVELY IN THE AREA. FEW PEOPLE READ A DAILY NEWS PAPER.
